headline: Should You Reconsider ON Stock After Its 23.9% Drop Amid EV Supply Chain Headlines?
summary: Curious if ON Semiconductor is a bargain or overpriced right now? You are in the right place for a deep dive into its valuation. If you have been watching the stock, you probably noticed it dipped 1.8% this week and has fallen 23.9% year-to-date, though it is still up an impressive 71.2% over the past five years. Recent headlines surrounding ON Semiconductor include conversations about shifts in the EV supply chain and investor sentiment toward chipmakers, which have created both cautious...
